item.title: 2022 Burning Man - Paradisium
item.description: Paradisium is a grove of trees reborn out of the ashes of The Folly. Photo: Mark Promson Involvement Lighting Design Network Design Links Paradisium Github Special Thanks Mark Slee: Creator of LXStudio John “Parts” Taylor: Helping out with the RGBWUA light fixture patterns
